blocks.name: kcnktkm1cn
blocks.content: k times k minus 1 is a complex number if k is a complex number. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 11-Mar-2018.)

blocks.name: muladd
blocks.content: Product of two sums. (Contributed by NM, 14-Jan-2006.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 19-Nov-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm muladd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c1)), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c2, cmul, c1)))))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c1)), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c2, cmul, c1))), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, c2), caddc, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, c3)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c2)), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  sylan(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, c2), caddc, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, c3))), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc))
  addcl(c0, c1)
  3expb(wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, c2), caddc, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, c3))))
  adddi(co(c0, caddc, c1), c2, c3)
  oveq12d(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, c2), caddc, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, c3), co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  adantrr(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, c2), co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c2))))
  3expa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, c2), co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c2))))
  adddir(c0, c1, c2)
  adantrl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, c3), co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3))))
  3expa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, c3), co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3))))
  adddir(c0, c1, c3)
  3eqtrd(co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c2)), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3))), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c1)), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c2, cmul, c1))), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3))), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c1)), caddc, co(c0, cmul, c3)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  add32d(co(c0, cmul, c2), co(c1, cmul, c2), co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  ad2ant2lr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c2), cc))
  mulcl(c1, c2)
  adantrl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3)), cc))
  anandirs(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3)), cc))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3)), cc), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c3), cc), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c3), cc))
  addcl(co(c0, cmul, c3), co(c1, cmul, c3))
  oveq12d(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3))), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c2), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c1)), caddc, co(c0, cmul, c3)), co(c2, cmul, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  3eqtr3d(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3))), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c1)), caddc, co(c0, cmul, c3)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c0, cmul, c3)), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c0, cmul, c3)), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  oveq2d(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c0, cmul, c3)), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3), co(c3, cmul, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  ad2ant2l(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wceq(co(c1, cmul, c3), co(c3, cmul, c1)))
  mulcom(c1, c3)
  addassd(co(c0, cmul, c2), co(c0, cmul, c3), co(c1, cmul, c3), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  ad2ant2l(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c3), cc))
  mulcl(c1, c3)
  add32d(co(c0, cmul, c2), co(c0, cmul, c3), co(c3, cmul, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  ad2ant2r(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c2), cc))
  ad2ant2l(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(co(c3, cmul, c1), cc))
  ad2ant2lr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wceq(co(c1, cmul, c2), co(c2, cmul, c1)))
  mulcom(c1, c2)
  addassd(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c1)), co(c0, cmul, c3), co(c2, cmul, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  an4s(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c1)), cc))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c1)), cc), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c2), cc), wcel(co(c3, cmul, c1), cc))
  mulcl(c0, c2)
  ancoms(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(co(c3, cmul, c1), cc))
  mulcl(c3, c1)
  addcl(co(c0, cmul, c2), co(c3, cmul, c1))
  ad2ant2rl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c3), cc))
  mulcl(c0, c3)
  ad2ant2lr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c1), cc))
  ancoms(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c1), cc))
  mulcl(c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: subdi
blocks.content: Distribution of multiplication over subtraction. Theorem I.5 of [Apostol] p. 18. (Contributed by NM, 18-Nov-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm subdi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2))))
} = {
  eqcomd(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  mpbird(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmin, c2))), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmin, c2))), co(c0, cmul, c1)))
  eqtr3d(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmin, c2))), co(c0, cmul, c1), co(c0, cmul, co(c2, caddc, co(c1, cmin, c2))), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  adddid(c0, c2, co(c1, cmin, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c2), cc))
  oveq2d(c0, cmul, co(c2, caddc, co(c1, cmin, c2)), c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(c2, caddc, co(c1, cmin, c2)), c1))
  ancoms(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(c2, caddc, co(c1, cmin, c2)), c1))
  pncan3(c2, c1)
  subaddd(co(c0, cmul, c1), co(c0, cmul, c2), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmin, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cc))
  mulcl(c0, c1)
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c2), cc))
  mulcl(c0, c2)
  3impb(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cc))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cc), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c2), cc))
  subcl(c1, c2)
  mulcl(c0, co(c1, cmin, c2))
}

blocks.name: subdir
blocks.content: Distribution of multiplication over subtraction. Theorem I.5 of [Apostol] p. 18. (Contributed by NM, 30-Dec-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm subdir(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cmul, c2), co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c1, cmul, c2))))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cmul, c2), co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(c2, cmul, co(c0, cmin, c1)), co(co(c2, cmul, c0), cmin, co(c2, cmul, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  3coml(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(c2, cmul, co(c0, cmin, c1)), co(co(c2, cmul, c0), cmin, co(c2, cmul, c1))))
  subdi(c2, c0, c1)
  stoic3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cmul, c2), co(c2, cmul, co(c0, cmin, c1))), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cc))
  subcl(c0, c1)
  mulcom(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2)
  oveq12d(co(c0, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c1, cmul, c2), co(c2, cmul, c0), co(c2, cmul, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(c0, cmul, c2), co(c2, cmul, c0)))
  mulcom(c0, c2)
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(c1, cmul, c2), co(c2, cmul, c1)))
  mulcom(c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: ine0
blocks.content: The imaginary unit ` _i ` is not zero. (Contributed by NM, 6-May-1999.)
blocks.origin:
thm ine0() {
  |- wne(ci, nat0)
} = {
  neir(ci, nat0)
  mto(wceq(ci, nat0), wceq(nat1, nat0))
  neii(nat1, nat0)
  ax-1ne0()
  3eqtr3g(nat1, nat0, co(nat0, caddc, nat1), co(co(ci, cmul, ci), caddc, nat1), wceq(ci, nat0))
  oveq1d(nat0, caddc, nat1, co(ci, cmul, ci), wceq(ci, nat0))
  syl6req(nat0, co(ci, cmul, ci), co(ci, cmul, nat0), wceq(ci, nat0))
  oveq2(ci, nat0, ci, cmul)
  mul01i(ci)
  ax-icn()
  addid2i(nat1)
  ax-1cn()
  ax-i2m1()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ine0() {
  ⊢ i ≠ 0
} = {
  neir(ci, nat0)
  mto(i = 0, 1 = 0)
  neii(nat1, nat0)
  ax-1ne0()
  3eqtr3g(nat1, nat0, (0[+]1), ((i[×]i)[+]1), i = 0)
  oveq1d(nat0, caddc, nat1, (i[×]i), i = 0)
  syl6req(nat0, (i[×]i), (i[×]0), i = 0)
  oveq2(ci, nat0, ci, cmul)
  mul01i(ci)
  ax-icn()
  addid2i(nat1)
  ax-1cn()
  ax-i2m1()
}

blocks.name: mulneg1
blocks.content: Product with negative is negative of product. Theorem I.12 of [Apostol] p. 18. (Contributed by NM, 14-May-1999.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm mulneg1(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(cneg(c0), cmul, c1), cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1))))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(co(cneg(c0), cmul, c1), cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1)), co(co(nat0, cmin, c0), cmul, c1), co(nat0, cmin, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  eqtrd(co(co(nat0, cmin, c0), cmul, c1), co(nat0, cmin, co(c0, cmul, c1)), co(co(nat0, cmul, c1), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  mp3an1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(co(nat0, cmin, c0), cmul, c1), co(co(nat0, cmul, c1), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c1))), wcel(nat0, cc))
  0cn()
  subdir(nat0, c0, c1)
  oveq1d(co(nat0, cmul, c1), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c1), nat0, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  mul02d(c1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  oveq1i(cneg(c0), cmul, c1, co(nat0, cmin, c0))
  df-neg(c0)
  df-neg(co(c0, cmul, c1))
}

blocks.name: mulneg2
blocks.content: The product with a negative is the negative of the product. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jul-2004.)

blocks.name: mulneg12
blocks.content: Swap the negative sign in a product. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jul-2004.)

blocks.name: mul2neg
blocks.content: Product of two negatives. Theorem I.12 of [Apostol] p. 18. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jul-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 19-Nov-2011.)

blocks.name: submul2
blocks.content: Convert a subtraction to addition using multiplication by a negative. (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-2007.)

blocks.name: mulm1
blocks.content: Product with minus one is negative. (Contributed by NM, 16-Nov-1999.)

blocks.name: addneg1mul
blocks.content: Addition with product with minus one is a subtraction. (Contributed by AV, 18-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: mulsub
blocks.content: Product of two differences. (Contributed by NM, 14-Jan-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm mulsub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cmul, co(c2, cmin, c3)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c1)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c2, cmul, c1)))))
} = {
  eqtr3d(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cmul, co(c2, cmin, c3)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c1)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c2, cmul, c1))), co(co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), cmul, co(c2, caddc, cneg(c3))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  oveqan12d(co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), cmul, co(c2, caddc, cneg(c3)), co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)))
  negsub(c0, c1)
  negsub(c2, c3)
  3eqtrd(co(co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), cmul, co(c2, caddc, cneg(c3))), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c1)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c2, cmul, c1))), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(cneg(c3), cmul, cneg(c1))), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, cneg(c3)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cneg(c1)))), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c1)), caddc, cneg(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c2, cmul, c1)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  sylanl2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), cmul, co(c2, caddc, cneg(c3))), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(cneg(c3), cmul, cneg(c1))), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, cneg(c3)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cneg(c1))))), wcel(cneg(c1), cc))
  negcl(c1)
  sylanr2(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cneg(c1), cc)), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), cmul, co(c2, caddc, cneg(c3))), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(cneg(c3), cmul, cneg(c1))), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, cneg(c3)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cneg(c1))))), wcel(cneg(c3), cc))
  negcl(c3)
  muladd(c0, cneg(c1), c2, cneg(c3))
  oveq12d(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(cneg(c3), cmul, cneg(c1))), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, cneg(c3)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cneg(c1))), co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c1)), cneg(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c2, cmul, c1))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  ad2ant2l(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(cneg(c3), cmul, cneg(c1))), co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c1))))
  oveq2d(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(cneg(c3), cmul, cneg(c1)), co(c3, cmul, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c3, cc)))
  ancoms(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wceq(co(cneg(c3), cmul, cneg(c1)), co(c3, cmul, c1)))
  mul2neg(c3, c1)
  an42s(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, cneg(c3)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cneg(c1))), cneg(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c2, cmul, c1)))))
  ancom2s(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, cneg(c3)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cneg(c1))), cneg(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c2, cmul, c1)))))
  eqtr4d(co(co(c0, cmul, cneg(c3)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cneg(c1))), cneg(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c2, cmul, c1))), co(cneg(co(c0, cmul, c3)), caddc, cneg(co(c2, cmul, c1))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc))))
  oveqan12d(co(c0, cmul, cneg(c3)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cneg(c1)), cneg(co(c0, cmul, c3)), cneg(co(c2, cmul, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  mulneg2(c0, c3)
  mulneg2(c2, c1)
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(cneg(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c2, cmul, c1))), co(cneg(co(c0, cmul, c3)), caddc, cneg(co(c2, cmul, c1)))), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c3), cc), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c1), cc))
  negdi(co(c0, cmul, c3), co(c2, cmul, c1))
  negsubd(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c1)), co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c2, cmul, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  an4s(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c1)), cc))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c1)), cc), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c2), cc), wcel(co(c3, cmul, c1), cc))
  mulcl(c0, c2)
  ancoms(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(co(c3, cmul, c1), cc))
  mulcl(c3, c1)
  addcl(co(c0, cmul, c2), co(c3, cmul, c1))
  an42s(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c2, cmul, c1)), cc))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c2, cmul, c1)), cc), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c3), cc), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c1), cc))
  mulcl(c0, c3)
  ancoms(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c1), cc))
  mulcl(c2, c1)
  addcl(co(c0, cmul, c3), co(c2, cmul, c1))
}

blocks.name: mulsub2
blocks.content: Swap the order of subtraction in a multiplication. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 24-Jun-2013.)

blocks.name: mulm1i
blocks.content: Product with minus one is negative. (Contributed by NM, 31-Jul-1999.)

blocks.name: mulneg1i
blocks.content: Product with negative is negative of product. Theorem I.12 of [Apostol] p. 18. (Contributed by NM, 10-Feb-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)

blocks.name: mulneg2i
blocks.content: Product with negative is negative of product. (Contributed by NM, 31-Jul-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)

blocks.name: mul2negi
blocks.content: Product of two negatives. Theorem I.12 of [Apostol] p. 18. (Contributed by NM, 14-Feb-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)

blocks.name: subdii
blocks.content: Distribution of multiplication over subtraction. Theorem I.5 of [Apostol] p. 18. (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-1994.)

blocks.name: subdiri
blocks.content: Distribution of multiplication over subtraction. Theorem I.5 of [Apostol] p. 18. (Contributed by NM, 8-May-1999.)

blocks.name: muladdi
blocks.content: Product of two sums. (Contributed by NM, 17-May-1999.)

blocks.name: mulm1d
blocks.content: Product with minus one is negative. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)

blocks.name: mulneg1d
blocks.content: Product with negative is negative of product. Theorem I.12 of [Apostol] p. 18. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)

blocks.name: mulneg2d
blocks.content: Product with negative is negative of product. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)

blocks.name: mul2negd
blocks.content: Product of two negatives. Theorem I.12 of [Apostol] p. 18. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)

blocks.name: subdid
blocks.content: Distribution of multiplication over subtraction. Theorem I.5 of [Apostol] p. 18. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)

blocks.name: subdird
blocks.content: Distribution of multiplication over subtraction. Theorem I.5 of [Apostol] p. 18. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)

blocks.name: muladdd
blocks.content: Product of two sums. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)

blocks.name: mulsubd
blocks.content: Product of two differences. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)

blocks.name: muls1d
blocks.content: Multiplication by one minus a number. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 23-Dec-2017.)

blocks.name: mulsubfacd
blocks.content: Multiplication followed by the subtraction of a factor. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 28-Aug-2018.)

blocks.name: addmulsub
blocks.content: The product of a sum and a difference. (Contributed by AV, 5-Mar-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm addmulsub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c2, cmin, c3)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c2)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3)))))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c2, cmin, c3)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c2)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3))), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, c2), cmin, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, c3)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  subdid(co(c0, caddc, c1), c2, c3, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  addcld(c0, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  oveq12d(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, c2), cmin, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, c3), co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  adddird(c0, c1, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))
  adddird(c0, c1, c3, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))
}

blocks.name: subaddmulsub
blocks.content: The difference with a product of a sum and a difference. (Contributed by AV, 5-Mar-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm subaddmulsub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(c4, cc)), wceq(co(c4, cmin, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c2, cmin, c3))), co(co(co(c4, cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), cmin, co(c1, cmul, c2)), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3)))))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(c4, cmin, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c2, cmin, c3))), co(co(co(c4, cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), cmin, co(c1, cmul, c2)), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3))), co(c4, cmin, co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c2)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3)))), co(co(c4, cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c2))), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3))), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(c4, cc)))
  oveq2d(c4, cmin, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c2, cmin, c3)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c2)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3))), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(c4, cc)))
  3adant3(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(c4, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c2, cmin, c3)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c2)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3)))))
  addmulsub(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  subsubd(c4, co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3)), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(c4, cc)))
  addcld(co(c0, cmul, c2), co(c1, cmul, c2), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(c4, cc)))
  addcld(co(c0, cmul, c3), co(c1, cmul, c3), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(c4, cc)))
  mulcld(c0, c3, w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(c4, cc)))
  mulcld(c1, c3, w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(c4, cc)))
  simp2r(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, cc))
  oveq1d(co(c4, cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c2))), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3)), co(co(c4, cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), cmin, co(c1, cmul, c2)), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(c4, cc)))
  eqcomd(co(c4, cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c2))), co(co(c4, cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), cmin, co(c1, cmul, c2)), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(c4, cc)))
  subsub4d(c4, co(c0, cmul, c2), co(c1, cmul, c2), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(c4, cc)))
  simp3(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(c4, cc))
  mulcld(c0, c2, w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(c4, cc)))
  simp1l(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(c4, cc))
  mulcld(c1, c2, w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(c4, cc)))
  simp1r(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(c4, cc))
  simp2l(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, cc))
}

blocks.name: mulsubaddmulsub
blocks.content: A special difference of a product with a product of a sum and a difference. (Contributed by AV, 5-Mar-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm mulsubaddmulsub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))), wceq(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c2, cmin, c3))), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3)), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2))))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c2, cmin, c3))), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3)), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), co(co(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), cmin, co(c1, cmul, c2)), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  mpd3an3(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wceq(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c2, cmin, c3))), co(co(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), cmin, co(c1, cmul, c2)), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3)))), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c2), cc))
  subaddmulsub(c0, c1, c2, c3, co(c1, cmul, c2))
  eqtrd(co(co(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), cmin, co(c1, cmul, c2)), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3))), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3)), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), co(cneg(co(c0, cmul, c2)), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  oveq1d(co(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), cmin, co(c1, cmul, c2)), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3)), cneg(co(c0, cmul, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  syl6eqr(co(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), cmin, co(c1, cmul, c2)), cneg(co(c0, cmul, c2)), co(nat0, cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  eqtrd(co(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), cmin, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(nat0, cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), co(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c1, cmul, c2)), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  sub32d(co(c1, cmul, c2), co(c0, cmul, c2), co(c1, cmul, c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  oveq1d(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c1, cmul, c2)), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2), nat0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  subidd(co(c1, cmul, c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  mulcld(c1, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  df-neg(co(c0, cmul, c2))
  eqtrd(co(cneg(co(c0, cmul, c2)), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3))), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3)), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3)), caddc, cneg(co(c0, cmul, c2))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  addcomd(cneg(co(c0, cmul, c2)), co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  negcld(co(c0, cmul, c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  negsubd(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3)), co(c0, cmul, c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  addcld(co(c0, cmul, c3), co(c1, cmul, c3), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  mulcld(c0, c3, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  mulcld(c1, c3, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))
  mulcld(c0, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))
}
